reviewText: Absolutely wonderful! Bought for a friend who is housebound in the winter and she said I had brought church to her. She was so thrilled. THANK YOU FOR A WONDERFUL PRODUCT!
This was for my dad.  He is very happy with his DVD.
Very well-done call and response style.
I used it on a chartered bus to a rally.
Wonderful DVD. Really helps my husband and I focus when praying the rosary. We love it
Gave this to my kids to learn to say the rosary and meditate on the mysteries of Christ and His Mother.
This is very good as I am saying with a group of elderly people and they are likely it. Thank you.
Very good for teaching how to pray the rosary. The rosary beads are visible as the mysteries are presented.

It is a very nice DVD and helped with concentration . I was looking for more indepth visuals and scripture to go with each bead. But this is satisfactory when having to say my Rosary at a quicker pace.
very helpful for meditation without distractions

This is so helpful in learning the Rosary!  It has beautiful pictures and it gives easy to follow directions in saying the Rosary.  It is very pleasant to listen to while following along.  My thanks to the people who made this DVD.
